Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. 

I have a somewhat heavy modded version of ksp (70+ mods), but it's all running exceptionally well, especially since i changed the launcher to the 64 bit version.

 

However there is one thing that annoys me to death: when i load the game i receive something like 25-30 notification "this mod is not compatible" or "new version released" of that particular mod,  and they get repeated.

For the 2nd one i know that I have to find in the settings how to disable the check ( and i might have found them)

But I cannot find a way to solve the 1st problem, especially the 2 mods that are doing this are KER and docking alignment, that haven't got a proper 1.31 patch and get the message like 5 times each at the start.

How can i solve this?

thanks for everyone who will reply

remove all MiniAVC.dll's from your install ... that should solve your issue

There is a mod on the forum somewhere that does this for you at startup, forget what it is called

EDIT: Found it
ZeroMiniAVC in the OP of this thread ... all thanx go to @Malah

 

Edited February 12, 2018 by DoctorDavinci
